name: Mirifice
overview:
Mirifice Limited provides monitoring and testing software products, solutions, and services for broadcast and telecommunication industries. It offers MiriMON, a system for real-time monitoring of live Digital TV networks; and MiriATE, an automated test system for consumer devices, such as setâ€“top boxes and integrated digital TVâ€™s, and the services consumed through them. The company also provides software design and development, testing strategy and management, project and program management, technical consultancy, requirements analysis and system architecture, and QA and test execution services. Its MiriATE system is used for development and integration, acceptance, and device fault testing applications; and MiriMON system for network fault and performance management, service fault and performance management, capacity planning, device fault and performance management, consumer device vendor management, proactive customer care, improved customer support, reduced repair centre returns, and accurate service usage information applications. The company serves IPTV service providers, hybrid terrestrial-broadband TV service providers, hybrid satellite-broadband TV service providers, cable network operators, broadband and mobile operators, consumer device manufacturers, network operators, device manufacturers, device software vendors, silicon and hardware vendors, regulators and standards bodies, network and backend equipment manufacturers, technology vendors, and repair centers.

Mirifice Limited was founded in 2004 and is based in Bath, the United Kingdom.

funding_rounds.source_description: MIRIFICE SECURES VC FUNDING FOR INNOVATIVE DIGITAL TV MONITORING SOLUTION
